description.zh-cn: 西汉汉武帝的宠妃，汉昭帝的生母。因其手握玉钩的传说，被称为“钩弋夫人”。
description.en: A favored consort of Emperor Wu of Han during the Western Han dynasty and the mother of Emperor Zhao of Han. She was known as 'Lady Gouyi' due to a legend about a jade hook in her hand.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第七位皇帝。为了防止其子刘弗陵（汉昭帝）即位后主少母壮、外戚专权，下令处死了刘弗陵的生母赵婕妤。
description.en: The seventh emperor of the Western Han dynasty. To prevent a situation where a young emperor was dominated by a powerful empress dowager and her relatives after his son Liu Fuling (Emperor Zhao) ascended the throne, he ordered the execution of Liu Fuling's mother, Zhao Jieyu.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第八位皇帝，汉武帝与赵婕妤之子。即位后追封其母为皇太后，并为其修建云陵。
description.en: The eighth emperor of the Western Han dynasty, son of Emperor Wu and Zhao Jieyu. After ascending the throne, he posthumously honored his mother as Empress Dowager and had the Yunling Mausoleum built for her.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代后宫嫔御的一种等级称号。
description.en: A rank for imperial consorts in ancient China.

description.zh-cn: 古代帝国或王国中，给予皇帝或国王母亲的封号。
description.en: A title given to the mother of a reigning emperor or king in ancient empires or kingdoms.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝晚年发生的一场政治动乱，导致当时的太子刘据死亡，储君之位空缺。
description.en: A political turmoil during the late reign of Emperor Wu of Han, which led to the death of the incumbent Crown Prince Liu Ju and left the position of heir apparent vacant.

description.zh-cn: 汉高祖刘邦的皇后。她专权的史事成为汉武帝决定处死钩弋夫人的重要原因之一。
description.en: The empress of Emperor Gaozu of Han, Liu Bang. The historical precedent of her usurpation of power was a significant reason for Emperor Wu's decision to execute Lady Gouyi.

description.zh-cn: 中国古代的一种政治制度，为防止外戚专权，在储君年幼时将其生母赐死。汉武帝处死钩弋夫人的事件被视为此制度的先例。
description.en: An ancient Chinese political practice of executing the mother of a young heir apparent to prevent maternal relatives from usurping power. Emperor Wu's execution of Lady Gouyi is considered a precedent for this system.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期的北方王朝之一，其采纳并实行了“子贵母死”制度。
description.en: One of the Northern Dynasties during the Northern and Southern dynasties period in China, which adopted and implemented the 'Heir Apparent's Mother is Executed' system.

description.zh-cn: 汉昭帝为其母赵婕妤（钩弋夫人）修筑的陵墓。
description.en: The mausoleum built by Emperor Zhao of Han for his mother, Zhao Jieyu (Lady Gouyi).

description.zh-cn: 赵婕妤的父亲，后被其外孙汉昭帝追尊为顺成侯。
description.en: The father of Zhao Jieyu, who was posthumously honored as Marquis Shuncheng by his grandson, Emperor Zhao of Han.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝与卫子夫的长子，原为太子，后在巫蛊之乱中自杀。他是汉昭帝的异母兄。
description.en: The eldest son of Emperor Wu of Han and Wei Zifu. He was the original crown prince but committed suicide during the Witchcraft Demonic War. He was the half-brother of Emperor Zhao of Han.

description.zh-cn: 西汉第六位皇帝，汉武帝刘彻之父。
description.en: The sixth emperor of the Western Han dynasty, father of Emperor Wu of Han.

description.zh-cn: 汉景帝刘启的皇后，汉武帝刘彻之母。
description.en: The empress of Emperor Jing of Han, Liu Qi, and the mother of Emperor Wu of Han.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝刘彻的第二任皇后，戾太子刘据的生母。
description.en: The second empress of Emperor Wu of Han, Liu Che, and the mother of Crown Prince Liu Ju.

description.zh-cn: 汉昭帝（刘弗陵）是赵婕妤的儿子。
description.en: Emperor Zhao (Liu Fuling) was the son of Zhao Jieyu.

description.zh-cn: 汉昭帝（刘弗陵）是汉武帝刘彻的儿子。
description.en: Emperor Zhao (Liu Fuling) was the son of Emperor Wu, Liu Che.

description.zh-cn: 赵婕妤是汉武帝刘彻的宠妃。
description.en: Zhao Jieyu was a favored consort of Emperor Wu, Liu Che.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝为防止“子幼母壮”、外戚专权，在立刘弗陵为太子前，借故处死了赵婕妤（钩弋夫人）。
description.en: To prevent a situation of a 'young ruler and a strong mother' and the usurpation of power by maternal relatives, Emperor Wu executed Zhao Jieyu (Lady Gouyi) on a pretext before making her son Liu Fuling the crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 赵氏被汉武帝封为婕妤，居住在钩弋宫。
description.en: Lady Zhao was granted the rank of Jieyu by Emperor Wu and resided in the Gouyi Palace.

description.zh-cn: 其子汉昭帝即位后，追封赵氏为皇太后。
description.en: After her son, Emperor Zhao, ascended the throne, Lady Zhao was posthumously honored as Empress Dowager.

description.zh-cn: 巫蛊之乱导致原太子刘据死亡，储君之位空缺，为刘弗陵最终被立为太子创造了条件。
description.en: The Witchcraft Demonic War led to the death of the original Crown Prince Liu Ju, leaving the position of heir apparent vacant, which created the opportunity for Liu Fuling to eventually be appointed crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝以吕后专权的历史为鉴，担忧女主专权，这成为他决定处死钩弋夫人的一个重要动机。
description.en: Drawing a lesson from the history of Empress Lü's usurpation of power, Emperor Wu feared the concentration of power in the hands of an empress dowager, which became a significant motive for his decision to execute Lady Gouyi.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝处死钩弋夫人的做法，为后来的北魏王朝所效仿，形成了“子贵母死”的制度。
description.en: Emperor Wu's execution of Lady Gouyi was emulated by the later Northern Wei dynasty, establishing the 'Heir Apparent's Mother is Executed' system.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝杀钩弋夫人的做法被后来的北魏所援引和效仿，并制度化为“子贵母死”。
description.en: The act of Emperor Wu killing Lady Gouyi was cited and emulated by the later Northern Wei dynasty, and was institutionalized as the 'Heir Apparent's Mother is Executed' practice.

description.zh-cn: 汉昭帝即位后，征发两万人为其母赵婕妤修筑了云陵。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Zhao mobilized 20,000 people to construct the Yunling Mausoleum for his mother, Zhao Jieyu.

description.zh-cn: 赵婕妤是赵公的女儿。
description.en: Zhao Jieyu was the daughter of Lord Zhao.

description.zh-cn: 汉昭帝即位后，追尊其外祖父赵公为顺成侯。
description.en: After ascending the throne, Emperor Zhao posthumously honored his maternal grandfather, Lord Zhao, as Marquis Shuncheng.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝刘彻是汉景帝刘启的儿子。
description.en: Emperor Wu, Liu Che, was the son of Emperor Jing, Liu Qi.

description.zh-cn: 汉武帝刘彻是孝景皇后王娡的儿子。
description.en: Emperor Wu, Liu Che, was the son of Empress Jing, Wang Zhi.

description.zh-cn: 刘据是汉武帝刘彻的儿子。
description.en: Liu Ju was the son of Emperor Wu, Liu Che.

description.zh-cn: 刘据是卫子夫的儿子。
description.en: Liu Ju was the son of Wei Zifu.

description.zh-cn: 卫子夫是汉武帝刘彻的第二任皇后。
description.en: Wei Zifu was the second empress of Emperor Wu, Liu Che.

description.zh-cn: 汉昭帝刘弗陵与戾太子刘据是同父异母的兄弟，父亲均为汉武帝刘彻。
description.en: Emperor Zhao, Liu Fuling, and Crown Prince Li, Liu Ju, were half-brothers, both sons of Emperor Wu, Liu Che.
